name: A murder ? Or...
description:
"An incident occurred at the mansion where we were asked to investigate! Being timid, I relied on sound to solve it."

What kind of game ?
  • Board game style realtime sound play horror
  • Headphones or earphones recommended
  • A simple game of about 10-20 minutes
Story
  • I'm a jack-of-all-trades, and I was asked to investigate a certain mansion
  • Traffic was bad and it was night when i arrived at the mansion
  • There is something strange about the mansion

Something like that.
